item.description: There’s a lot of hype about the promise of AI agents today, but payments are a huge limiting factor. WeTransfer’s expiry dates haven’t gone away, but you can at least extend them
item.description: WeTransfer’s expiry dates have been a major paint-point for users — especially creatives. Thing is, if you don’t download the files the moment you get the link or email you can easily forget to do so before the link expires. At which point you’ll have to ask for it to be resent. item.title: India’s trade minister decries e-commerce growth, Amazon’s ‘predatory’ pricing
item.description: India’s commerce minister Piyush Goyal on Wednesday expressed concern over the rapid growth of e-commerce in the country, warning of potential disruption to small retailers.
